title: SOLD - Rare Piedmont Factory 42 - Vic Willis (HOF) St. Louis, With Bat - TOTAL POP 7
author: premiercardcollectors

posts.post_title: SOLD - Rare Piedmont Factory 42 - Vic Willis (HOF) St. Louis, With Bat - TOTAL POP 7
posts.post_content:
Beautifully well presented Vic Willis (St. Louis with Bat) With a Rare Piedmont 350-460/42 Back in a PSA 2(MK).  The card back has some very light paper loss and if you look carefully, has some pencil marks on the bottom of the card back (mark).

Total PSA Population of ALL grades is 7.   This is equal to the Population of Drum backs for this card.

SOLD on Net54 - Thank you

PayPal, Venmo or Zelle no fee

Tons of vouches if needed.

Thanks for looking
